thread.title: BRIEF-TPI And Vestas Sign Wind Blade Supply Agreement To Open New Facility In China

title: BRIEF-TPI And Vestas Sign Wind Blade Supply Agreement To Open New Facility In China

organizations.name: china reuters staff   tpi composites inc

text: 12 AM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-TPI And Vestas Sign Wind Blade Supply Agreement To Open New Facility In China Reuters Staff   TPI Composites Inc: * TPI AND VESTAS SIGN WIND BLADE SUPPLY AGREEMENT TO OPEN NEW FACILITY IN CHINA * TPI COMPOSITES - ‍ BLADES WILL BE PRODUCED AT NEW FACILITY IN YANGZHOU, WHICH IS SCHEDULED TO OPEN FOR PRODUCTION IN H1 2019​ * TPI COMPOSITES INC - ‍SIGNED SUPPLY DEAL WITH VESTAS WIND SYSTEMS A/S TO PROVIDE BLADES FROM 4 MANUFACTURING LINES FOR NEW V150-4.2 MW WIND TURBINE​ Source text for Eikon:
